cause.description:
Like the group, but this is a cause, to help Live Earth help us know what we can do and how to raise awareness on the global warming. What are you doing on your part?
1. Raise awareness on global warming
2. How will our children and grandchildren fare if we've damaged the Earth on them?
3. The altered weather in places is, will and could affect animal's habitats and people
cause.mission: Help Live Earth raise awareness on global warming
cause.name: Live Earth Support Group
